name: Calamari Kid
description:
"Calamai Kid hides a lot of strategy in its mechanics" - TouchArcade

Compete in the greatest treasure hunt challenge in the world!
Weave through dangerous passageways.
Defeat those pesky creatures from the deep.
But be nice, it turns out you're stealing their gold, so...

DISTINCT REGIONS
Visit exotic locations, like Antarctica.

DEEP FRIENDS
Play as uniquely skilled characters!

PERFECT GAMEPLAY
Become the fastest in the leaderboards.

TREASURE HUNT
Challenges everyday to build your skills.

Send your compliments to hello@odowd.co
Developed in Melbourne, Australia.
